tag_list: internet-marketing, consultant, wsi, seo, ppc, branding, marketing-communication
overview:
Nidhish Alex is a web specialist with 6+ years of experience in various aspects of web engineering from web development, web site management, SEO, PPC, Affiliate Marketing, Email Marketing, Conversion Optimization and Internet business management.

Nidhish Alex is an expert who helps the marketers in implementing the inbound marketing principles and best practices in their company which include: blogging, search engine optimization, social media, lead conversion, lead nurturing and closed-loop analysis.
